abstract: Stocks are uneven as oil prices drop sharply.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices fell after the Energy Information Administration said stockpiles remained historically high and did not decrease by as much as investors expected.

headline.main: Market Wavers as Oil Prices Drop
headline.print_headline: Market Wavers as Oil Prices Drop

snippet: Oil prices fell after the Energy Information Administration said stockpiles remained historically high and did not decrease by as much as investors expected....
